titleStmt.title: Encouragements. For such as shall have intention to bee vnder-takers in the new plantation of Cape Briton, now New Galloway in America, by mee Lochinvar·
titleStmt.author: Gordon, Robert, Sir, d. 1627?

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Encouragements for New Galloway.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
